item.title: About
item.description:
How are you doing? Thank you for dropping by, if I am not coding or doing school work. I am either watching anime, or ricing. Here are few things about me.

  • Linux Enthusiast
  • Tiling Window Manager Fanboi
  • Trying to learn Machine Learning and Rust
  • Have done some Cyber Security Competition
  • Full Stack Experience
